content.text: I love to design clothes, but I keep it a secret from my family.
They're very conservative, so they wouldn't approve.
I see. Well, I'm a big fan of horror movies, but I know my parents wouldn't approve either.
I love horror movies too! I think they're so much fun.
Me too! I love the suspense and the scares.
Yeah, me too. I also love the way they can make you feel like you're not alone.
Exactly! I love that feeling of being scared but also being excited.
Me too! It's the best feeling.
I'm glad to meet someone who loves horror movies as much as I do.
Me too! We should watch some together sometime.
That would be fun! I know a few good ones we could watch.
Great! We'll have to make a plan sometime.
